comment: This Professor is Great and she's hilarious! You will do work in this class but it's not overwhelming and you will learn so much. She really wants you to succeed and it shows. I am so glad I added this class.

She's a great teacher and clearly knows what she is talking about. Her class is very dynamic and even though she does give a lot of assignments out. It's not hard at all. As long as you put in some type of effort.
Professor Riley is awesome! Her lectures have great examples that are very applicable to real life. She is very interested in her students' success.
This is my favorite teacher of all time, the true GOAT. If you take her you will not regret it I swear.

She's one of the few professors that has actually had experience in the field she's teaching in which is really appreciated. Prof Riley makes class really enjoyable- she's funny, knows what she is talking about, and is easy to work with if you have a problem. At the beginning of the year the work was too much but she realized it and eased up. A+

Relaxed professor that is passionate about her craft. Extremely knowledgable of the social media marketing industry. There is a handful of projects that you will work on during the course but each project can truly help build your skills if you put effort into them.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Participation matters

comment: Take this class, its a lot of fun.

She is amazing. She will work with you to make sure that not only pass but will understand if you have a lot going on and will try to accommodate to your schedule. DO NOT try and BS her she isnt out to try and fail you.

Professor Riley is literally the best professor you can ask for. She created the foundation for social media marketing classes in Georgia. You can tell by her experience in the field, attention to detail and great personality that she wants you to understand the content. Take this class if you are even remotely interested in the subject

Prof. Riley was an awesome professor. Very laid back and liked talking with the class. Assignments were manageable and helpful. Attendance isn't mandatory, but it's in your best interest to show up to class regularly because she shows examples of HW and occasionally rewards those who participate in class. Plenty of time for assignments. A+ prof.

If you can't do well in this class check your pulse. She is an engaging Professor that doesn't want a boring class anymore than you do. Bring your participation with you and you will have a good time or again. check your pulse. The class is something anyone can get useful information out of. A lot of homework but you can handle it. Accommodating.

We had about 4 quiz/exams, a blog paper due each week, & random assignments due. Just pay attention during class & you'll be fine! She is funny, easy-going, hip & young, understanding, helpful, just overall an amazing professor! I 100% recommend her!
